Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI doesn’t mark assignments therefore their feedback isn’t as reliable and useful as a teachers but for minor feedback it can be useful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher feedback usually makes more sense.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will almost always provide positive feedback unless u specify otherwise and won’t ever really give advice that I know will improve my work.
